dict.acceptation: 地区；教区；〈美〉（各州众议员）选举区；行政区，市区；

sent.orig: The District Officer reports regularly the work of the District Management Committee to the District Council.
sent.trans: 民政事务专员定时向区议会汇报地区管理委员会的工作。

sent.orig: Fangcun District into the Liwan District, administrative jurisdiction of the Liwan District.
sent.trans: 芳村区合并到荔湾区，行政上归荔湾区管辖。

sent.orig: They are East District, West District, RenHe district, MiYi County, YanBian County.
sent.trans: 它们是东区、西区、仁和区、米易县、盐边县。

sent.orig: Dongshan district into Yuexiu District, administrative jurisdiction of Yuexiu District.
sent.trans: 东山区合并到越秀区，行政上归越秀区管辖。

sent.orig: Factory:4-2 ChaGuang Factory District XiLiZhen ShaHe west road NanShan District ShenZhen Provice.
sent.trans: 工厂：深圳市南山区西丽镇沙河西路茶光工业区4栋。
